ygData.subject: Re: Lots o Wizard groups
ygData.msgSnippet: ... With the enchanter there you re usually only fighting one mob at a time.  Fights do last longer but with less downtime you are *much* safer moving through
ygData.messageBody:
>Same problem with the second group here that I saw
>before...Who does the damage? Yes, the monk does
>fairly good melee, the warrior is average/above
>average. Enchanter CAN do good, but then he's not
>doing what enchanters do best. Cleric Shaman Druid
>all spend a majority of their time healing/buffing.
>No big damage. Fights last forever.

With the enchanter there you're usually only fighting
one mob at a time. Fights do last longer but
with less downtime you are *much* safer moving
through a dungeon.

>The Wizzie group spends more "down time" sure, but
>that's only because the fights last 10 or 20
>seconds. Not 2 or 3 minutes.

Like I said the wizzie group is fine in a room with
a tent pitched...other than that you nuke some junk
in the hall everyone plops down to med and the
group dies when a roamer walks by. I've seen it
happen time and again.

-David


=====
